title: Irreparable
description: "He was powerless, no longer the dominant entity that he had thrived upon, ultimately he become the weaker sex and that is something he would never live with. My father was about to take back that power, he was going to take back his supremacy. And I was the one that was about to suffer for it. I just hoped that it was going to be over quickly. I can get through this. I have to." Anna dreams of nothing but falling in love. With the right one. But how can that happen when, she is an Irreparable mess? Her homelife broke her into a million pieces. She acts tough and sexy....how far will she go to erase the touch of someone that was meant to protect her, until their dying breath?Ethan has watched from the sidelines, always watching. Trying to protect. He wants her, He's sick of her hurting herself, her pain kills him. He's not about to stand around and take anymore. Can he be the one to finally ease the pain? Warning: Contains scenes of sexual and physical abuse that some might find disturbing.
author: Libby Ryan
